alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 20 at 2:09PM AKDT until October 21 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility. West winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less. * WHERE...Over Steese Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Drifting and blowing snow will make travel difficult along the Steese Highway over Eagle and Twelvemile Summits. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to decrease early Saturday with visibility improving.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
